comment._content: John Ford (July 28, 1862 – July 1941), lawyer and politician from New York, justice of the Supreme Court (1st D.) from 1907 to 1932 en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Ford_%28New_York_state_senator%29 This photo is depicted in The evening world., December 07, 1918, Final Edition, Page 3.
